# here are the private requirements needed for read the docs
# to build the docs

# private substra and connectlib
git+https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/owkin/substra.git
git+https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/owkin/connect-tools.git
git+https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/owkin/connectlib.git#egg=connectlib[dev]
# action needed to publish already generated by CI artifacts on RTD
# https://github.com/dfm/rtds-action#2-set-up-github-actions-workflow
# rtds_action corrected for private repos
git+https://github.com/maikia/rtds-action.git
